quotes.quote: Always do your best in whatever you do; set goals and seek challenges.
Modeling is really silent acting.
Modeling is a lonely business.
When you're acting your a person. When you're modeling you're a hanger.
Modeling is a tough job, your co workers are your rivals, it really puts a damper on your perspective of other girls.
Modeling is a great beginning, but it's also a kind of trap if you have any ambition or a mind that needs to be stimulated.
A model should be as simple as it can be but no simpler.
Modeling is an incredible job for a girl if she approaches it with her head on her shoulders. You travel, you speak to people, and it opens your mind to different things.
The secret to modeling is not being perfect. What one needs is a face that people can identify in a second. You have to be given what's needed by nature, and what's needed is to bring something new.
A smart model is a good model.
Modeling is not just beauty and smile, it takes boldness and style.
No one trusts a model except the man who wrote it; everyone trusts an observation, except the man who made it.
If you can't find a good role model, be one.
Modeling is a profession where your worth is tied up with looks.
Modeling teaches you to be completely concious of the camera. Acting is being totally unconcious of it.
This modeling thing, it's pretty easy, but actually it's also really tough.
Modeling is the world that feel most welcome in.
Modeling is not something you excel because you are clever but is based on physical appearance, but then you have to a businesswoman, like, to keep your longevity.
You need beauty to be a model but not to be a role model.
Everyone in society should be a role model, not only for their own self-respect, but for respect from others.
A model is an actor without a voice.
A role model is a person whose roles can be modelled. If the roles you conceive and give birth to today cannot be adopted by anyone in your absence, you are no good model.
Model the qualities that you want your children to show to each other.
Be the role model you needed when you were younger.
